title: [BUG] redis 6.0.11 build failed on FreeBSD 12.2
body:
```
cc -std=c11 -pedantic -DREDIS_STATIC='' -Wall -W -Wno-missing-field-initializersÂ Â  -O2 -pipe -fstack-protector-strong -fno-strict-aliasingÂ Â  -I../deps/hiredis -I../deps/linenoise -I../deps/lua/src -MMD -o sds.o -c sds.c
cc -std=c11 -pedantic -DREDIS_STATIC='' -Wall -W -Wno-missing-field-initializersÂ Â  -O2 -pipe -fstack-protector-strong -fno-strict-aliasingÂ Â  -I../deps/hiredis -I../deps/linenoise -I../deps/lua/src -MMD -o zmalloc.o -c zmalloc.c
zmalloc.c:59:5: error: function-like macro 'sizeof' is not defined
#if PREFIX_SIZE > 0
Â Â Â  ^
zmalloc.c:55:22: note: expanded from macro 'PREFIX_SIZE'
#define PREFIX_SIZE (sizeof(size_t))
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  ^
1 error generated.
gmake[3]: *** [Makefile:339: zmalloc.o] Error 1
gmake[3]: Leaving directory 'redis-6.0.11/src'
gmake[2]: *** [Makefile:6: all] Error 2
gmake[2]: Leaving directory 'redis-6.0.11'
*** Error code 1
```
Here's the patch to fix the build issue.
[patch-src-zmalloc.c.txt](https://github.com/redis/redis/files/6030814/patch-src-zmalloc.c.txt)
